other_tests.findings: Microscopic foci of intramucosal diffuse carcinoma identified; superficial infiltrates of malignant signet-ring cells detected in 2 adjacent blocks from the gastric cardia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient is free of disease, and repeated endoscopic examinations revealed no cancer seven years later.

other_tests.findings: Histologically normal stomach; no cancer detected.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient is free of disease eight years later after undergoing a total gastrectomy.

other_tests.findings: Partial foci of early diffuse gastric cancer detected in gastric mucosa.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient is free of disease eight years later after undergoing a total gastrectomy.

other_tests.findings: Early diffuse gastric carcinoma with infiltrates of signet-ring cells detected.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient is free of disease eight years later.
